content: अधिः [आधीयते दुःखमनेन आधा कि वा पृ. थस्वः] {@--1@} Mental pain or agony. See आधिः {@--2@} A woman in her courses. (= अवि.) {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} (As a prefix to verbs) over, above; (अधिकार); °स्था to stand over; °कृ to place over or at the head of; °रुह् to grow over or above; over and above, besides, in addition (आधिक्य); fully, completely (अतिशय, विशेष), to get something in addition to another; अधिगत्यजगत्यधीश्वरात् having obtained fully, अधि intensifying the meaning of the root; इतो वा सातिमीमहे दिवो वा पार्थिवादधि <ls>Rv. 1. 6. 10</ls>; (अधीमहे आधिक्येन याचामहे). {@--2@} (As a separable adverb) Over, above, from above (mostly Vedic); षष्टिर्वीरासो अधि षट् <ls>Rv. 7. 18. 14.</ls> {@--3@} (As a preposition) with <ab>acc.</ab> ({%a%}) Above, over, upon, in (उपरि); यं दंतमधिजायते नाडी तं दंतमुद्धरेत् <ls>Suśr.</ls> अध्यधि just above; लोकानुपर्युपर्यास्तेऽधोऽधोऽध्यधि च माधवः <ls>Bopadeva</ls>; with <ab>gen.</ab> also; ये नाकस्याधि रोचने दिवि <ls>Rv. 1. 19. 6</ls> above the sun; °विटपि <ls>Śi. 7. 35</ls>; °त्वत् <ls n="Śi.">7. 41</ls>; °रजनि <ls n="Śi. 7.">52</ls> at night. ({%b%}) With reference to, concerning, in the case of, on the subject of (अधिकृत्य) (mostly in adverbial compounds in this sense); हरौ इति अधिहरि; so अधिस्त्रि; कृष्णमधिकृत्य प्रवृत्ता कथा अधिकृष्णं; so °ज्योतिषं, °लोकं, °दैवं, °दैवतं treating of stars &c.; °पुरंध्रि <ls>Śi. 6. 32</ls> in the case of women. ({%c%}) (With <ab>abl.</ab>) Just over, more than (अधिक); सत्त्वादधि महानात्मा <ls>Kaṭh.</ls>; अविदितादधि <ls>Ken.</ls> ({%d%}) (With <ab>loc.</ab>) Over, on or upon, above (showing lordship or sovereignty over something) (ऐश्वर्य); अधिरीश्वरे <ls>P. I. 4. 97</ls>; अधि भुवि रामः <ls>P. II. 3. 9</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> Rāma rules over the earth; the country ruled over may be used with <ab>loc.</ab> of ‘ruler’; अधि रामे भूः {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%}; प्रहारवर्मण्यधि विदेहा जाताः <ls>Dk. 77</ls> subject to, under the government of, become the property or possession of (अधि denoting स्वत्व in this case); under, inferior to (हीन); अधि हरौ सुराः (<ls>Bopadeva</ls>) the gods are under Hari. {@--4@} (As first member of Tatpuruṣa compounds) ({%a%}) Cheif, supreme, principal, presiding; °देवता presiding deity; °राजः supreme or sovereign ruler; °पतिः supreme lord &c. ({%b%}) Redundant, superfluous (growing over another); °दंतः = अध्यारूढः (दंतस्योपरि जातः) दंतः <ls>P. VI. 2. 188</ls>. ({%c%}) Over, excessive; °अधिक्षेपः high censure. According to G. <ls>M.</ls> अधि has these senses: अधिरध्ययनैश्वर्यवशित्वस्मरणाधिके . {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%}; उपाध्यायादधीते; इङोऽध्ययनार्थकत्वस्य अधिद्योतकः; अधिपतिः ( ऐश्वर्ये); अधीनः (वशित्वे) अधिगतः इनं; मातुरध्येति (स्मरणे); अधिकं (अधिके). In the Veda अधि is supposed by <ls>B. and R.</ls> to have the senses of ‘out of’, ‘from,’ ‘of,’ ‘among,’ ‘before’, ‘beforehand’, ‘for’, ‘in favour of’, ‘in’ ‘at’.
